item.title: 罗伯特-赫尔（Robert Hur）周二将面对急于质疑他对总统拜登处理机密文件的一年之久的调查结果的立法者。
item.description:
Robert Hur on Tuesday will face lawmakers eager to question the findings of his yearlong probe into Pres. Biden's handling of classified documents. https://t.co/GDErKhR6lL

item.title: 美国共和党参议员查克-格拉斯利（Chuck Grassley）指责拜登政府试图压制经常强调移民法庭系统缺陷的移民法官。

item.title: 根据皮尤研究中心（Pew Research Center）的一份新报告，近四分之三的美国青少年表示，当他们不带手机时会感到快乐或平静。
item.description:
Nearly three-quarters of U.S. teens say they feel happy or peaceful when they don't have their phones with them, according to a new report from the Pew Research Center. https://t.co/L9oG0HBn4x pic.twitter.com/eIxcGihj0O

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 周一，一辆校车在伊利诺伊州美国 24 号公路上与一辆半挂卡车相撞，造成三名儿童和两名成人死亡。
item.description:
Three children and two adults died after a school bus collided with a semi-truck on U.S. Route 24 in Illinois on Monday, authorities said.https://t.co/3MVTK1Q0n7

item.title: 美国南方司令部表示，在针对海地政府的帮派暴力活动激增之际，美军机组人员空运了美国驻海地大使馆的非必要人员，使其脱离险境。
item.description:
U.S. military crews airlifted nonessential U.S. Embassy personnel in Haiti out of harm's way amid a surge of gang-related violence against the government, the U.S. Southern Command said.@ABC News' Matt Rivers is on the ground with more. https://t.co/R2c9f67evx pic.twitter.com/4VY44vKp3o

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.description:

Pres. Biden "absolutely did not apologize" for his use of the term "an illegal" during last week's State of the Union address, principal deputy press secretary Olivia Dalton told reporters Monday. https://t.co/gTmPgFiXFg

item.title: 巴西、厄瓜多尔、秘鲁和葡萄牙的田径运动员将在巴黎奥运会前接受更频繁的兴奋剂检测，因为这些国家的反兴奋剂计划不达标。
item.description:
Track and field athletes from Brazil, Ecuador, Peru and Portugal will be tested more often ahead of the Paris Olympics because of sub-standard anti-doping programs at home, the sport’s investigators said. https://t.co/NzlSygVWkn

item.title: 周日晚，在《名利场》杂志举办的奥斯卡颁奖晚会上，悉尼-斯威尼（Sydney Sweeney）以安吉丽娜-朱莉（Angelina Jolie）的形象亮相。奥斯卡颁奖典礼结束后，斯威尼身着马克-布瓦（Marc Bouwer）设计的白色礼服走上了红地毯，这件白色礼服正是朱莉出席 2004 年奥斯卡颁奖典礼时所穿的。
item.description:
Sydney Sweeney channeled Angelina Jolie at the Vanity Fair Oscar Party on Sunday night.

Following the Academy Awards ceremony, Sweeney walked the red carpet in a white gown by Marc Bouwer — the same white gown that Jolie wore to the 2004 Oscars. https://t.co/IfbDPnqKmw

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

Actresses Christina Applegate and Jamie-Lynn Sigler are opening up for the first time together about the health battle they both share: multiple sclerosis. https://t.co/hV2RQ5UFei

item.title: 当局称，上周末在新泽西州伍德布里奇的一户居民家中发生了一起明显的狗袭击事件，造成一名婴儿死亡，孩子的父母受伤。
item.description:
An infant was killed and the child's parents injured in an apparent attack by a dog at a home in Woodbridge, New Jersey, over the weekend, authorities said.

item.description:

item.title: 在一场公众争议中，威尔士王妃凯特做了一件在她之前只有少数王室成员做过的事：她公开道歉了。

item.title: 伊娃-门德斯（Eva Mendes）支持她的 "男人 "瑞恩-高斯林（Ryan Gosling）在周日奥斯卡颁奖典礼上的表现。"这位女演员和两个孩子的母亲在 Instagram 上发布的视频中写道："永远支持我的男人。
item.description:
Eva Mendes is supporting her “man” Ryan Gosling following his Oscars performance on Sunday.

“Always by my man,” the actress and mom of two wrote in an Instagram video post of herself standing next to Gosling’s Oscars dressing room sign. https://t.co/yHsw8wpCqh

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 周日，在达文-乔伊-伦道夫凭借在《宿醉》（The Holdovers）中饰演玛丽-兰姆（Mary Lamb）一角获得奥斯卡最佳女配角奖之前，她的前同学、2014 年在同一奖项中获奖的露皮塔-尼永奥（Lupita Nyong'o）介绍了她。
item.description:
Moments before Da'Vine Joy Randolph won the Oscar for Best Supporting Actress for her performance as Mary Lamb in "The Holdovers" on Sunday, her former schoolmate, Lupita Nyong'o, who won in the same category in 2014, introduced her. https://t.co/YYM6Wu7Yf6 pic.twitter.com/VdRmOxsOgZ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：特朗普的律师要求负责监督其封口费案件的法官推迟审判，同时最高法院将权衡特朗普的论点，即他在任期间发生的行为可以免于起诉。
item.description:
BREAKING: Attorneys for Trump have asked the judge overseeing his hush money case to delay the trial while the Supreme Court weighs Trump's argument that he is immune from prosecution for conduct that occurred while he was in office.https://t.co/aPBRV58rdv pic.twitter.com/OrkqgaouxJ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024
